mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO STUDENT ( student_name, student_password, student_gender, student_birthday, home_tel_number, student_phone_number, student_email, school_name, school_type, student_grade, student_photo_file, student_photo_url, student_memo, mother_name, mother_phone_number, father_name, father_phone_number, parent_password ) VALUES ( #{studentName}, {studentPassword}, #{studentGender}, #{studentBirthday}, #{homeTelNumber}, #{studentPhoneNumber}, #{studentEmail}, #{schoolName}, #{schoolType}, #{studentGrade}, #{studentPhotoFile}, #{studentPhotoUrl}, #{studentMemo}, #{motherName}, #{motherPhoneNumber}, #{fatherName}, #{fatherPhoneNumber}, #{parentPassword}
)
